definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="points">points</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:points</field><value name="VAL"><block type="player_persistent_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">bgames_physical_points</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:points</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:points</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">(int)points</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> points</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
